product_name: Swiss Army Spartan Serrated Pocket Knife
long_description: The compact Victorinox Spartan Serrated pocket knife supplies 2 blades and other tools, yet folds down to a mere 3.58 in.- perfect for slipping into your pocket or attaching to your key chain. Knife features a large serrated blade, small straight blade, can opener with small screwdriver, bottle opener with large screwdriver and wire stripper. Also includes tweezers, a reamer with sewing eye, a corkscrew, a toothpick and a lanyard ring. Rugged Swiss stainless-steel components, sturdy nylon handles and aluminum interior housings ensure the Victorinox Spartan Serrated pocket knife will last for years.
short_description: The compact Victorinox Spartan Serrated pocket knife supplies 2 blades and other tools, yet folds down to a mere 3.58 in.- perfect for slipping into your pocket or attaching to your key chain.
